question: Which month (e.g. January, February,... etc) from 2018-{year} has consistently recorded India's worst air quality index (AQI)?
code:
def true_code():
    import numpy as np
    import pandas as pd
    main_data = pd.read_csv("raw_data/main_data.csv")
    main_data['Timestamp'] = pd.to_datetime(main_data['Timestamp'])
    data = main_data[(main_data["Timestamp"].dt.year >= 2018) & (main_data["Timestamp"].dt.year <= {code_year})]
    data = data.groupby(data["Timestamp"].dt.month_name())["PM2.5"].mean().reset_index()
    data = data.sort_values(by="PM2.5")
    print(data.iloc[-1]["Timestamp"])


true_code()
